verbs.description: A bipartisan group of more than 70 former US attorneys [V: are] calling on Attorney General Jeff Sessions to reverse the Trump administration 's policy of prosecuting all people who cross the border illegally , saying it is " dangerous , expensive , and inconsistent " with the values of the Justice Department .
